column1: Treatment includes medicines, talk therapy, or both.
MEDICINES Antidepressants are medicines used to treat depression.
They work by bringing back the chemicals in your brain to the right levels.
DO NOT stop taking it or change the amount (dosage) you are taking without talking to your provider.
OTHER TREATMENTS FOR DEPRESSION - Electroconvulsive therapy (ECT) may improve mood in people with severe depression or suicidal thoughts who do not get better with other treatments.
- Light therapy may relieve depression symptoms in the winter time.
